title: As a BOC Admin, I want Clubs prevented from Transfering Players FROM the DSL
custom_steps:
Related to: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-776|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-776|smart-link] 

AC:

* Club users will get a hard error when attempting to submit a Transfer from the DSL to a domestic affiliate
* BOC users will be able to override
** Title: Error
** Body: Please contact the BOC in order to transfer a player from the DSL.
** Buttons: Ignore & Continue (BOC only), Back
* Transfers between DSL Clubs will continue to not have any warning

title: As a MNC Admin, I want Clubs to be able to attach files to an Approved MNC
custom_steps:
AC:

* Users with MNC Club Admin permissions will see an Edit button when viewing Approved Minor Contracts (all types)
* When the Club user is viewing the Approved contract in Edit mode, only the Attached Files section will be editable
* When viewing the Attached Files section, Club users will be able to attach files and choose labels, however they will not be able to delete anything.  There will be no trash can icon
** BOC Users will continue to have the trash can icon
* When a club user saves an approved contract, only the file section will save.  No calcs will be re-run.

title: IPL Pub/Sub - Add message type to error response
custom_steps:
The IPL team would like to have the message type included in the error response sent to IPL from Ebis. 

# Add EbisMessageType to ProspectStatusMessage.
# Populate it with the original message type when an error with creating/saving/merging the player occurs.
# It does not need to be populated if there is a parsing error with the JSON.

title: As a MNC Admin, I want the Life Insurance portion of MNCs to mirror MJCs
custom_steps:
AC:

* In the Life Insurance portion of MNCs (all types) there will be a â€œLife/AD will be purchased outside of MLB's programsâ€� checkbox added
* If this box is checked, an â€œAmountâ€� field will be displayed
* If both these fields are complete, two lines will be added to the printed version of the MNC (see attached)
* These updates will be reflected in all available languages



!image-20230623-172053.png|width=976,height=863!

title: As a BOC Admin, I do not want EBIS to change the position of any MJ player after OD
custom_steps:
Related to: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-287|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-287|smart-link] 

Context: Matt Beaty appeared in games for both KC and SF in 2023.  KC resigned him and upon selection, his position was updated to RP, which put them over the pitcher limit.  Position for MJ players should be locked in after OD.

AC:

* After Opening Day the Baseball Position of any player who has accrued at least one day of MLS, may only be updated manually, by BOC Admins, unless the player becomes a TWP.

custom_steps:
Template File:

* There will be a template button on the footer of the Import Log widget in Agents & Agencies
* This will be a downloadable file labeled, â€œTemplateâ€�

title: As a BOC Admin, I want a downloadable Import 40-Man Results file
custom_steps:
Import 40-Man Wire: [https://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=import_40-man&g=1|https://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=import_40-man&g=1|smart-link] 

AC:

* A downloadable file should appear under the Results column of the Import Log widget in the Agents & Agencies dashboard
* After selecting and downloading it, you should be taken to a file with the Import 40-Man Results for the most recent uploaded agent/agency file
* This file will include the tabs:
** Updates
*** Within this tab should include the columns:
**** Team
**** PlayerID
**** Name
**** Field
**** From
**** To
** Unknown Agencies
*** Within this tab should include the columns:
**** Agency Name
** Unknown Agents
*** Within this tab should include the columns:
**** UID
**** Last Name
**** First Name
**** FullName
**** PersonType
**** Address Type
**** Address1
**** Address2
**** Address3
**** City
**** State
**** Postal Code
**** Country
**** Work Phone
**** CellularPhone
**** Fax Number
**** Email Address
**** Organization
**** Organization ID
**** Certification Date
**** LastPAForm

title: As a BOC Admin, I want an Error message to show when uploading files with incorrect formats using the Import 40-Man button on Import Log widget in Agents & Agencies
custom_steps:
Import 40-Man Wire: [https://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=import_40-man&g=1|https://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=import_40-man&g=1|smart-link] 

Format Template: 

[^Agent-Agency Format Template (b4470b37-fc0f-4d59-9727-27622474cbd9).xlsx]

AC:

* When you select the Import 40-Man button on the Import Log widget in the Agents & Agencies dashboard, a file browser modal should appear
* This should give you the ability to select and upload an agent/agency file from your computer

Rule:

*  Only allow the user to select and upload accepted file formats from the file browser

AC:

* If file with inappropriate format is selected, and the user clicks the Open button, an Error message should appear:
** Title: Error
** Text: â€œThe spreadsheet format is incorrect, please use the following template.â€�
** There should be an â€œ40-Man Templateâ€� downloadable file below this message
*** This file should show the appropriate format to use
** Action Button Title: Close
*** This button should appear at the bottom of the pop-up with the ability to return the user to the Agents & Agencies dashboard

Warning:

* You should use the Import Agent Info BEFORE using Import 40-Man

title: As a BOC Admin, I want the "Import 40-Man" button on the Import Log widget in Agents & Agencies for uploading files
custom_steps:
Import 40-Man Wire: [https://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=import_40-man&g=1|https://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=import_40-man&g=1|smart-link] 

AC:

* When you select the Import 40-Man button on the Import Log widget in the Agents & Agencies dashboard, a file browser modal should appear
* This should give you the ability to select and upload an agent/agency file from your computer
* Once appropriate file is selected, and user clicks the Open button, an Import 40-Man info pop-up should appear while the file is uploading:
** Title: Import 40-Man Info
** Text: â€œThis may take a few minutesâ€¦â€�
** Action Button Title: Cancel Import
*** This button should appear at the bottom of the pop-up with the ability to return the user to the Agents & Agencies dashboard
* If uploaded properly, an â€œImport Completeâ€� success message should appear â†’ and eventually fade away
* The file you just uploaded should now appear on the top row of the Import Log widget

Warning:

* You should use Import Agent Info BEFORE using Import 40-Man

Rule:

*  Only allow the user to select and upload accepted file formats from the file browser

title: NFY MNC - Performance Bonus section | Criteria | Points text missing
custom_steps:
If Points 1, Points 2 or Points 3 are selected  as the Criteria, then the following text should appear

Points 1: 2 pts for each GS; 1.5 pts for each relief appearance >= 2 innings; 1 pt for each relief appearance < 2 innings.

Points 2: 3 pts for each GS; 2 pts for each relief appearance.

Points 3: 2 pts for each GS; 1.5 pts for each relief appearance > 2 innings; 1 pt for each relief appearance <= 2 innings.

View MJC_Points screenshot for an example

This only applies to the PB section

title: NFY MNC - Award Bonus / Performance Criteria - Complex
custom_steps:
If Complex is selected as the Criteria for Performance Bonus or as the Award for Award Bonus sections, display WISYWIG editor.

view screenshots

[https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/#/minor-contract?mncId=31020990&playerId=56242|https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/#/minor-contract?mncId=31020990&playerId=56242|smart-link]

title: As a BOC Admin, I want EBIS to Generate New Addendum F's Upon Assignment
custom_steps: Add. Fs are no longer valid once a player is assigned to a new organization. Can we add an option in trades or waiver claims that allow a Club to generate a new addendum F for a player? Similar to the life insurance forms?

title: As an EBIS User, I want an Error Message if Transactions Bulletin is Sent before Waiver Request
custom_steps:
I want an error message that comes up if we try to send the Transactions Bulletin before the Waiver Request Bulletin. And the same for if we try to send Waiver Result Bulletin before Request Bulletin.

AC:

* When â€˜Send Bulletinâ€™ is clicked on the Daily Transaction bulletin, the system will perform a check to see if the Waiver Request Bulletin for that day has been sent out yet
* If the check passes, the Bulletin will be sent as expected
* If the check fails, the system will return an error to the user:
** Title: Warning
** Body: The Waiver Request Bulletin has not yet been sent for today.
** Buttons: Ignore & Continue, Back

Note: This rule should not fire on days where there are no Weekend Waivers

title: As a MNC Admin, I want the Add B section of Non-First Year Contracts inactive for club users if the player is on a MJC
custom_steps:
AC:

* If a player is on an active MJC, and is being optioned or outrighted and needs to sign a new Non-First Year contract, the Addendum B portion will not be available to Club Users
* Club Users will not be able to expand the section to add any Add B terms
* BOC Users will continue to be able to add Add B terms to these contracts

title: As a MNC Admin, I want Housing Allowance to appear on the Add C of Non-First Year Contracts if the player is on an MJC
custom_steps:
Related to: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1627|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1627|smart-link] 



AC:

* If a player is on an active MJC, and is being optioned or outrighted and needs to sign a new Non-First Year contract, the Addendum C will contain the Housing Allowance fields that are being included on Subsequent Câ€™s
** Housing for Uncovered Players checkbox
** Amount
** Language dropdown

title: As a BOC Admin, I only want Housing Allowance on Subsequent Cs
custom_steps:
AC:

* Currently, there is a Housing Allowance section on all Addendum Cs
* This will be changed, so the Housing Allowance section only appears on subsequent Cs
* A language selection dropdown will be added to this section so standard language can be selected and printed on the Addendum C (screenshot of mock attached)
** !image-20230517-154941.png|width=1003,height=67!
* Housing Allowances entered onto a subsequent C will not update the Addendum C / Housing summary table on MNCs

title: EBIS React - Style new React left nav, top nav, and main content pane so they look identical to the existing Angular UI
custom_steps: Create an outer navigation layer for EBIS in React that mimicks the existing Angular navigation along the sides and top of the UI application.  6

title: Set up new React project and routing to allow seamless front end for EBIS React
custom_steps: For this task, Iâ€™m going to create and deploy 2 fake react pages accessible via direct link in the ebis app to get all of the infrastructure and routing set up. They will be at ebis.mlb.com/app/page1 and ebis.mlb.com/app/page2 and will have very simple UIs.

title: As a BOC User, I want to send a player memo via Text
custom_steps:
AC:
 - When a player memo is sent, EBIS will send the memo to all players via Text using the MLB Official Contact Info
 - Deliveries and failures will be logged and available for download
